btnWrapperObj;\r\n\tvar className = ob.className;\r\n\twhile (className.indexOf("bWrapper")==-1) {\r\n\t\tob = ob.parentNode;\r\n\t\tclassName = ob.className;\r\n\t}\r\n\treturn ob;\r\n}\r\n\r\nButtonManager.prototype.hpButtonOver = function(btnWrapperObj) {\r\n\tvar ob = this.getWrapperReference(btnWrapperObj);\r\n\tvar childButton = this.getButtonChild(ob);\r\n\tif (!childButton.disabled) {\r\n\t\tif (ob.className.indexOf("bEmphasized")!=-1) {\r\n\t\t\tob.className = "bWrapperOver bEmphasized";\r\n\t\t}\r\n\t\telse {\r\n\t\t\tob.className = "bWrapperOver";\r\n\t\t}\r\n\t}\r\n}\r\n\r\nButtonManager.prototype.hpButtonUp = function(btnWrapperObj) {\r\n\tvar ob = this.getWrapperReference(btnWrapperObj);\r\n\tvar childButton = this.getButtonChild(ob);\r\n\tif (!childButton.disabled) {\r\n\t\tif (ob.className.indexOf("bEmphasized")!=-1) {\r\n\t\t\tob.className = "bWrapperUp bEmphasized";\r\n\t\t}\r\n\t\telse btnWrapperObj;\r\n\tvar className = ob.className;\r\n\twhile (className.indexOf("bWrapper")==-1) {\r\n\t\tob = ob.parentNode;\r\n\t\tclassName = ob.className;\r\n\t}\r\n\treturn ob;\r\n}\r\n\r\nButtonManager.prototype.hpButtonOver = function(btnWrapperObj) {\r\n\tvar ob = this.getWrapperReference(btnWrapperObj);\r\n\tvar childButton = this.getButtonChild(ob);\r\n\tif (!childButton.disabled) {\r\n\t\tif (ob.className.indexOf("bEmphasized")!=-1) {\r\n\t\t\tob.className = "bWrapperOver bEmphasized";\r\n\t\t}\r\n\t\telse {\r\n\t\t\tob.className = "bWrapperOver";\r\n\t\t}\r\n\t}\r\n}\r\n\r\nButtonManager.prototype.hpButtonUp = function(btnWrapperObj) {\r\n\tvar ob = this.getWrapperReference(btnWrapperObj);\r\n\tvar childButton = this.getButtonChild(ob);\r\n\tif (!childButton.disabled) {\r\n\t\tif (ob.className.indexOf("bEmphasized")!=-1) {\r\n\t\t\tob.className = "bWrapperUp bEmphasized";\r\n\t\t}\r\n\t\telse {\r\n\t\t\tob.className = "bWrapperUp";\r\n\t\t}\r\n\r\n\t}\r\n}\r\n\r\nButtonManager.prototype.hpButtonDown = function(btnWrapperObj) {\r\n\tvar ob = this.getWrapperReference(btnWrapperObj);\r\n\tvar childButton = this.getButtonChild(ob);\r\n\tif (!childButton.disabled) {\r\n\t\tif (ob.className.indexOf("bEmphasized")!=-1) {\r\n\t\t\tob.className = "bWrapperDown bEmphasized";\r\n\t\t}\r\n\t\tel', 'se {\r\n\t\t\tob.className = "bWrapperDown";\r\n\t\t}\r\n\t\tchildButton.focus();\r\n\t}\r\n}\r\n\r\nButtonManager.prototype.disableButton = function(btnObj) {\r\n\tbtnObj.disabled = true;\r\n\tvar wrapper = this.getWrapperReference(btnObj);\r\n\twrapper.onmousedown= null;\r\n\twrap', 'per.onmouseup=  null;\r\n\twrapper.onmouseover=  null;\r\n\twrapper.onmouseout=  null;\r\n\tif (wrapper.className.indexOf("bEmphasized")!=-1) {\r\n\t\twrapper.className = "bWrapperDisabled bEmphasized";\r\n\t}\r\n\telse {\r\n\t\twrapper.className = "bWrapperDisabled";\r\n\t}\r\n}\r\nButtonManager.prototype.enableButton = function(btnObj) {\r\n\tbtnObj.disabled = false;\r\n\tvar wrapper = this.getWrapperReference(btnObj);\r\n\tif (wrapper.className.indexOf("bEmphasized")!=-1) {\r\n\t\twrapper.className = "bWrapperUp bEmphasized";\r\n\t}\r\n\telse {\r\n\t\twrapper.className = "bWrapperUp";\r\n\t}\r\n\twrapper.onmousedown= function() {ourButtonManager.hpButtonDown(this);}\r\n\twrapper.onmouseup= function() {ourButtonManager.hpButtonOver(this);}\r\n\twrapper.onmouseover= function() {ourButtonManager.hpButtonOver(this);}\r\n\twrapper.onmouseout= function() {ourButtonManager.hpButtonUp(this);}\r\n}\r\nButtonManager.prototype.disableButtonById = function(btnId) {\r\n\tvar btnObj = document.getElementById(btnId)\r\n\tthis.disableButton(btnObj);\r\n}\r\nButtonManager.prototype.enableButtonById = function(btnId) {\r\n\tvar btnOb', 'j = document.getElementById(btnId)\r\n\tthis.enableButton(btnObj);\r\n}\r\nButtonManager.prototype.getButtonChild = function(divObj) {\r\n\tvar nodes = divObj.getElementsByTagName("*");\r\n\tfor(var i = 0; i < nodes.length; i++)\r\n\t\tif(nodes[i].tagName == "BUTTON', '" || nodes[i].tagName == "INPUT" || nodes[i].tagName == "A" || nodes[i].tagName == "SUBMIT")\r\n\t\t\treturn nodes[i];\r\n\r\n\treturn nodes[0];\r\n}\r\n\r\n\r\nButtonManager.prototype.init  = function() {\r\n\tvar divs = document.getElementsByTagName("DIV");\r\n\tfor (var i=0;i<divs.length;i++) {\r\n\t\t\r\n\t\tif (divs[i].className.indexOf("bWrapper")!=-1) {\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t// some button styles might have two nested divs, making a 2px border, or three.  therefore we have to be careful when we look down inside the divs looking for the buttons. \r\n\t\t\tvar button = this.getButtonChild(divs[i]);\r\n\r\n\t\t\t// looking up to see if we\'re in a vertical button set. \r\n\t\t\tvar lookingForVerticalButtonSet = divs[i];\r\n\t\t\twhile ((lookingForVerticalButtonSet) && (lookingForVerticalButtonSet.className!="verticalButtonSet")) {\r\n\t\t\t\tlookingForVerticalButtonSet = lookingForVerticalButtonSet.parentNode;\r\n\t\t\t}\r\n\t\t\tif (lookingForVerticalButtonSet) {\r\n\t\t\t\tbutton.style.width = "100%";\r\n\t\t\t}\r\n\t\t\telse if ((!button.getAttribute("disableminimumwidth")) && (button.className.indexOf("shrinkWrapButton")==-1', ')){\r\n\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t// setting widths based on which size button this is to be. \r\n\t\t\t\t// tempting to use CSS property min-width and  accept that it only works on mozilla. However mozilla forces align left in this case, which does more harm than good to', ' the design. \r\n\t\t\t\tif (button.className.indexOf("hpButtonSmall")!=-1) {\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\tif (button.offsetWidth < 47) button.style.width = "47px";\r\n\t\t\t\t}\r\n\t\t\t\telse if (button.className.indexOf("hpButtonVerySmall")!=-1) {\r\n\t\t\t\t\t// these are tiny buttons with no minimum width, like the help button on the pagetitle bar. \r\n\t\t\t\t}\r\n\r\n\t\t\t\t// catchall \r\n\t\t\t\t//  This line causes some mozilla problems with the vertical buttons btw, although it is no longer used by them. \r\n\t\t\t\telse if (button.offsetWidth < 83) button.style.width = "83px";\r\n\t\t\t}\r\n\r\n\t\t\tif (!button.disabled) {\r\n\t\t\t\tdivs[i].onmousedown= function() {ourButtonManager.hpButtonDown(this);}\r\n\t\t\t\tdivs[i].onmouseup= function() {ourButtonManager.hpButtonOver(this);}\r\n\t\t\t\tdivs[i].onmouseover= function() {ourButtonManager.hpButtonOver(this);}\r\n\t\t\t\tdivs[i].onmouseout= function() {ourButtonManager.hpButtonUp(this);}\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\t\t\t// this effectively transfers the onclick up to the level of the div. \r\n\t\t\t\t// this makes the entire div+button structure effectively into the \'button\', and moreover covers c', 'ases when the user clicks only one of the the right or bottom borders. \r\n\t\t\t\tif (button.onclick) {\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\teval("divs[i].onclick = function() {var hardCodedFunction = "+button.onclick+" ;return hardCodedFunction();};");\r\n\t\t\t\t\tbutton.onclick = functio', 'n(event) {};\r\n\t\t\t\t}\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\r\n\t\t\t\tvar buttonChildren = divs[i].getElementsByTagName("BUTTON");\r\n\t\t\t\tvar inputChildren = divs[i].getElementsByTagName("INPUT");\r\n\t\t\t\tfor (var j=0;j<buttonChildren.length;j++) {\r\n\r\n\t\t\t\t\tbuttonChildren[j].onfocus = function() {ourButtonManager.hpButtonDown(this);}\r\n\t\t\t\t\tbuttonChildren[j].onblur = function() {ourButtonManager.hpButtonUp(this);}\r\n\t\t\t\t}\r\n\t\t\t\tfor (var j=0;j<inputChildren.length;j++) {\r\n\t\t\t\t\tinputChildren[j].onfocus = function() {ourButtonManager.hpButtonDown(this);}\r\n\t\t\t\t\tinputChildren[j].onblur = function() {ourButtonManager.hpButtonUp(this);}\r\n\t\t\t\t}\r\n\t\t\t}\r\n\t\t\telse {\r\n\t\t\t\tif (divs[i].className.indexOf("bEmphasized")!=-1) {\r\n\t\t\t\t\tdivs[i].className = "bWrapperDisabled Pad handles the remainder.\r\n   var len = str.length - str.length % 3;\r\n   var pad = str.length % 3;\r\n\r\n   for(i=0; i < len; i+=3) {\r\n      v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n      v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4) + ((str[i+1] & 0xf0) >>> 4);\r\n      v2 = ((str[i+1] & 0x0f) << 2) + ((str[i+2] & 0xc0) >>> 6);\r\n      v3 = (str[i+2] & 0x3f);\r\n      \r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v0);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v1);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v2);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v3);\r\n   }\r\n\r\n    // remainder padded with "="\r\n   switch(pad) {\r\n      default:\r\n      case 0:\r\n            break;\r\n      \r\n      case 1:\r\n            v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n            v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4);\r\n            sST += b64_str.charAt(v0) + b64_str.charAt(v1) + "==";\r\n            break;\r\n      \r\n      case 2:\r\n            v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n            v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4) + (']

Pad handles the remainder.\r\n   var len = str.length - str.length % 3;\r\n   var pad = str.length % 3;\r\n\r\n   for(i=0; i < len; i+=3) {\r\n      v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n      v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4) + ((str[i+1] & 0xf0) >>> 4);\r\n      v2 = ((str[i+1] & 0x0f) << 2) + ((str[i+2] & 0xc0) >>> 6);\r\n      v3 = (str[i+2] & 0x3f);\r\n      \r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v0);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v1);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v2);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v3);\r\n   }\r\n\r\n    // remainder padded with "="\r\n   switch(pad) {\r\n      default:\r\n      case 0:\r\n            break;\r\n      \r\n      case 1:\r\n            v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n            v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4);\r\n            sST += b64_str.charAt(v0) + b64_str.charAt(v1) + "==";\r\n            break;\r\n      \r\n      case 2:\r\n            v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n            v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4) + (', '(str[i+1] & 0xf0) >>> 4);\r\n            v2 = ((str[i+1] & 0x0f) << 2);\r\n            sST += b64_str.charAt(v0) + b64_str.charAt(v1) + b64_str.charAt(v2) + "=";\r\n            break;\r\n   }\r\n   return sST;\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction GetCookie(name)\r\n{\r\n   index = doc', 'ument.cookie.indexOf(name, 0);\r\n   if(index == -1) return null;\r\n   index += name.length + 1;\r\n   endex = document.cookie.indexOf(";", index);\r\n   if(endex == -1) endex = document.cookie.length;\r\n   return document.cookie.substring(index, endex);\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction SetCookie (name, value, path, secure, expires, domain)\r\n{\r\n   document.cookie = name + \r\n                      "=" +\r\n                      value +\r\n                      ((expires == null) ? "" : ("; expires=" + expires.toGMTString())) +\r\n                      ((path == null) ? "" : ("; path=" + path)) +\r\n                      ((domain == null) ? This will add a classname as a class selector, if it is not already present, and without deleting other unrelated classnames that might be present. \r\nfunction appendClassName(obj, newClassName) {\r\n\tif (obj.className.indexOf(newClassName)!=-1) return true;\r\n\tif (!obj.className) obj.className = newClassName;\r\n\telse obj.className = obj.className + " " + newClassName;\r\n}\r\nfunction removeClassName(obj, classNameToRemove) {\r\n\tvar', ' newClassName = obj.className.replace(" "+classNameToRemove,"");\r\n\tnewClassName = newClassName.replace(classNameToRemove+" ","");\r\n\tif (obj.className.length == newClassName.length) {\r\n\t\tnewClassName = newClassName.replace(classNameToRemove,"");\r\n\t}\r', '\n\tobj.className = newClassName;\r\n}\r\n', '</script>\r\n', '<SCRIPT language="javascript">', '\r\n<!--\\n//hide\r\n\r\nfunction b64encode(string)\r\n{\r\n   var v0, v1, v2, v3;\r\n   var sST = "";\r\n   var b64_str = \'ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz', '0123456789+/\';\r\n    \r\n   // convert string (input) to array of numbers\r\n   var str = new Array(string.length);\r\n   for (i=0; i<string.length; i++) {\r\n      str[i]= string.charCodeAt(i);\r\n   }\r\n   \r\n    // every three bytes in is 4 characters out.  Pad handles the remainder.\r\n   var len = str.length - str.length % 3;\r\n   var pad = str.length % 3;\r\n\r\n   for(i=0; i < len; i+=3) {\r\n      v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n      v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4) + ((str[i+1] & 0xf0) >>> 4);\r\n      v2 = ((str[i+1] & 0x0f) << 2) + ((str[i+2] & 0xc0) >>> 6);\r\n      v3 = (str[i+2] & 0x3f);\r\n      \r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v0);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v1);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v2);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v3);\r\n   }\r\n\r\n    // remainder padded with "="\r\n   switch(pad) {\r\n      default:\r\n      case 0:\r\n            break;\r\n      \r\n      case 1:\r\n            v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n            v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4);\r\n            sST += b64_str.charAt(v0) + b64_str.charAt(v1) + "==";\r\n            break;\r\n      \r\n      case 2:\r\n            v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n            v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4) + (', '(str[i+1] & 0xf0) >>> 4);\r\n            v2 = ((str[i+1] & 0x0f) << 2);\r\n            sST += b64_str.charAt(v0) + b64_str.charAt(v1) + b64_str.charAt(v2) + "=";\r\n            break;\r\n   }\r\n   return sST;\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction GetCookie(name)\r\n{\r\n   index = doc', 'ument.cookie.indexOf(name, 0);\r\n   if(index == -1) return null;\r\n   index += name.length + 1;\r\n   endex = document.cookie.indexOf(";", index);\r\n   if(endex == -1) endex = document.cookie.length;\r\n   return document.cookie.substring(index, endex);\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction SetCookie (name, value, path, secure, expires, domain)\r\n{\r\n   document.cookie = name + \r\n                      "=" +\r\n                      value +\r\n                      ((expires == null) ? Pad handles the remainder.\r\n   var len = str.length - str.length % 3;\r\n   var pad = str.length % 3;\r\n\r\n   for(i=0; i < len; i+=3) {\r\n      v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n      v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4) + ((str[i+1] & 0xf0) >>> 4);\r\n      v2 = ((str[i+1] & 0x0f) << 2) + ((str[i+2] & 0xc0) >>> 6);\r\n      v3 = (str[i+2] & 0x3f);\r\n      \r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v0);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v1);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v2);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v3);\r\n   }\r\n\r\n    // remainder padded with "="\r\n   switch(pad) {\r\n      default:\r\n      case 0:\r\n            break;\r\n      \r\n      case 1:\r\n            v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n            v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4);\r\n            sST += b64_str.charAt(v0) + b64_str.charAt(v1) + "==";\r\n            break;\r\n      \r\n      case 2:\r\n            v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n            v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4) + (', '(str[i+1] & 0xf0) >>> 4);\r\n            v2 = ((str[i+1] & 0x0f) << 2);\r\n            sST += b64_str.charAt(v0) + b64_str.charAt(v1) + b64_str.charAt(v2) + "=";\r\n            break;\r\n   }\r\n   return sST;\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction GetCookie(name)\r\n{\r\n   index = doc', 'ument.cookie.indexOf(name, 0);\r\n   if(index == -1) return null;\r\n   index += name.length + 1;\r\n   endex = document.cookie.indexOf(";", index);\r\n   if(endex == -1) endex = document.cookie.length;\r\n   return document.cookie.substring(index, endex);\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction SetCookie (name, value, path, secure, expires, domain)\r\n{\r\n   document.cookie = name + \r\n                      "=" +\r\n                      value +\r\n                      ((expires == null) ? "; secure" : "");\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction get1779(strName, strPassword, strServer, method)\r\n   {\r\n   var nto;\r\n   var strDn = "";\r\n   var strNetBIOSDomain = "";\r\n   var strUserName = "";\r\n\r\n   if(strName.indexOf("\\\\", 0) != -1)\r\n      {\r\n      strNetBIOSDomain = strName.slice(0, strName.indexOf("\\\\"));\r\n      strUserName      = strName.slice(strName.indexOf("\\\\")+1);\r\n   ', '   }\r\n   else if(strName.indexOf("@", 0) != -1)\r\n      {\r\n      strUserName      = strName.slice(0, strName.indexOf("@"));\r\n      strNetBIOSDomain = strName.slice(strName.indexOf("@")+1);\r\n      }\r\n   else\r\n      {\r\n      strUserName      = strName;', '\r\n      strNetBIOSDomain = "";\r\n      }\r\n\r\n   try\r\n      {\r\n      nto = new ActiveXObject("NameTranslate");\r\n      \r\n      // We are going to get the name from a server\r\n      if(method == ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_GC || strNetBIOSDomain.length == 0)\r\n         {\r\n         nto.Init(ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_GC, strServer);\r\n         }\r\n      else\r\n         {\r\n         nto.InitEx(ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_SERVER, strServer, strUserName, strNetBIOSDomain, strPassword);\r\n         }\r\n\r\n      // Give it a name\r\n      nto.Set(ADS_NAME_TYPE_UNKNOWN, strName);\r\n\r\n      // Get the name back in RFC 1779 format\r\n      strDn = nto.Get(ADS_NAME_TYPE_1779);\r\n      }\r\n   catch(ex)\r\n      {\r\n      window.status = ("Unable to get DN - Exception[" + ex.name + "]: " + ex.message);\r\n      }\r\n   return(strDn);\r\n   }\r\n\r\nfunction getDn(strName, strPassword)\r\n   {\r\n   var dn = "";\r\n\r\n   if(strName.toUpperCase().indexOf("CN", 0) == 0)\r\n      {\r\n      // Starts with a CN. Pad handles the remainder.\r\n   var len = str.length - str.length % 3;\r\n   var pad = str.length % 3;\r\n\r\n   for(i=0; i < len; i+=3) {\r\n      v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n      v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4) + ((str[i+1] & 0xf0) >>> 4);\r\n      v2 = ((str[i+1] & 0x0f) << 2) + ((str[i+2] & 0xc0) >>> 6);\r\n      v3 = (str[i+2] & 0x3f);\r\n      \r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v0);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v1);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v2);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v3);\r\n   }\r\n\r\n    // remainder padded with "="\r\n   switch(pad) {\r\n      default:\r\n      case 0:\r\n            break;\r\n      \r\n      case 1:\r\n            v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n            v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4);\r\n            sST += b64_str.charAt(v0) + b64_str.charAt(v1) + "==";\r\n            break;\r\n      \r\n      case 2:\r\n            v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n            v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4) + (', '(str[i+1] & 0xf0) >>> 4);\r\n            v2 = ((str[i+1] & 0x0f) << 2);\r\n            sST += b64_str.charAt(v0) + b64_str.charAt(v1) + b64_str.charAt(v2) + "=";\r\n            break;\r\n   }\r\n   return sST;\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction GetCookie(name)\r\n{\r\n   index = doc', 'ument.cookie.indexOf(name, 0);\r\n   if(index == -1) return null;\r\n   index += name.length + 1;\r\n   endex = document.cookie.indexOf(";", index);\r\n   if(endex == -1) endex = document.cookie.length;\r\n   return document.cookie.substring(index, endex);\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction SetCookie (name, value, path, secure, expires, domain)\r\n{\r\n   document.cookie = name + \r\n                      "=" +\r\n                      value +\r\n                      ((expires == null) ? "; secure" : "");\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction get1779(strName, strPassword, strServer, method)\r\n   {\r\n   var nto;\r\n   var strDn = "";\r\n   var strNetBIOSDomain = "";\r\n   var strUserName = "";\r\n\r\n   if(strName.indexOf("\\\\", 0) != -1)\r\n      {\r\n      strNetBIOSDomain = strName.slice(0, strName.indexOf("\\\\"));\r\n      strUserName      = strName.slice(strName.indexOf("\\\\")+1);\r\n   ', '   }\r\n   else if(strName.indexOf("@", 0) != -1)\r\n      {\r\n      strUserName      = strName.slice(0, strName.indexOf("@"));\r\n      strNetBIOSDomain = strName.slice(strName.indexOf("@")+1);\r\n      }\r\n   else\r\n      {\r\n      strUserName      = strName;', '\r\n      strNetBIOSDomain = "";\r\n      }\r\n\r\n   try\r\n      {\r\n      nto = new ActiveXObject("NameTranslate");\r\n      \r\n      // We are going to get the name from a server\r\n      if(method == ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_GC || strNetBIOSDomain.length == 0)\r\n         {\r\n         nto.Init(ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_GC, strServer);\r\n         }\r\n      else\r\n         {\r\n         nto.InitEx(ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_SERVER, strServer, strUserName, strNetBIOSDomain, strPassword);\r\n         }\r\n\r\n      // Give it a name\r\n      nto.Set(ADS_NAME_TYPE_UNKNOWN, strName);\r\n\r\n      // Get the name back in RFC 1779 format\r\n      strDn = nto.Get(ADS_NAME_TYPE_1779);\r\n      }\r\n   catch(ex)\r\n      {\r\n      window.status = ("Unable to get DN - Exception[" + ex.name + "]: " + ex.message);\r\n      }\r\n   return(strDn);\r\n   }\r\n\r\nfunction getDn(strName, strPassword)\r\n   {\r\n   var dn = "";\r\n\r\n   if(strName.toUpperCase().indexOf("CN", 0) == 0)\r\n      {\r\n      // Starts with a CN. Pad handles the remainder.\r\n   var len = str.length - str.length % 3;\r\n   var pad = str.length % 3;\r\n\r\n   for(i=0; i < len; i+=3) {\r\n      v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n      v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4) + ((str[i+1] & 0xf0) >>> 4);\r\n      v2 = ((str[i+1] & 0x0f) << 2) + ((str[i+2] & 0xc0) >>> 6);\r\n      v3 = (str[i+2] & 0x3f);\r\n      \r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v0);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v1);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v2);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v3);\r\n   }\r\n\r\n    // remainder padded with "="\r\n   switch(pad) {\r\n      default:\r\n      case 0:\r\n            break;\r\n      \r\n      case 1:\r\n            v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n            v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4);\r\n            sST += b64_str.charAt(v0) + b64_str.charAt(v1) + "==";\r\n            break;\r\n      \r\n      case 2:\r\n            v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n            v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4) + (', '(str[i+1] & 0xf0) >>> 4);\r\n            v2 = ((str[i+1] & 0x0f) << 2);\r\n            sST += b64_str.charAt(v0) + b64_str.charAt(v1) + b64_str.charAt(v2) + "=";\r\n            break;\r\n   }\r\n   return sST;\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction GetCookie(name)\r\n{\r\n   index = doc', 'ument.cookie.indexOf(name, 0);\r\n   if(index == -1) return null;\r\n   index += name.length + 1;\r\n   endex = document.cookie.indexOf(";", index);\r\n   if(endex == -1) endex = document.cookie.length;\r\n   return document.cookie.substring(index, endex);\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction SetCookie (name, value, path, secure, expires, domain)\r\n{\r\n   document.cookie = name + \r\n                      "=" +\r\n                      value +\r\n                      ((expires == null) ? "" : ("; expires=" + expires.toGMTString())) +\r\n                      ((path == null) ? "" : ("; path=" + path)) +\r\n                      ((domain == null) ? "" : ("; domain=" + domain)) +\r\n                      ((secure == true) ? "; secure" : "");\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction get1779(strName, strPassword, strServer, method)\r\n   {\r\n   var nto;\r\n   var strDn = "";\r\n   var strNetBIOSDomain = "";\r\n   var strUserName = "";\r\n\r\n   if(strName.indexOf("\\\\", 0) != -1)\r\n      {\r\n      strNetBIOSDomain = strName.slice(0, strName.indexOf("\\\\"));\r\n      strUserName      = strName.slice(strName.indexOf("\\\\")+1);\r\n   ', '   }\r\n   else if(strName.indexOf("@", 0) != -1)\r\n      {\r\n      strUserName      = strName.slice(0, strName.indexOf("@"));\r\n      strNetBIOSDomain = strName.slice(strName.indexOf("@")+1);\r\n      }\r\n   else\r\n      {\r\n      strUserName      = strName;', '\r\n      strNetBIOSDomain = "";\r\n      }\r\n\r\n   try\r\n      {\r\n      nto = new ActiveXObject("NameTranslate");\r\n      \r\n      // We are going to get the name from a server\r\n      if(method == ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_GC || strNetBIOSDomain.length == 0)\r\n         {\r\n         nto.Init(ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_GC, strServer);\r\n         }\r\n      else\r\n         {\r\n         nto.InitEx(ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_SERVER, strServer, strUserName, strNetBIOSDomain, strPassword);\r\n         }\r\n\r\n      // Give it a name\r\n      nto.Set(ADS_NAME_TYPE_UNKNOWN, strName);\r\n\r\n      // Get the name back in RFC 1779 format\r\n      strDn = nto.Get(ADS_NAME_TYPE_1779);\r\n      }\r\n   catch(ex)\r\n      {\r\n      window.status = ("Unable to get DN - Exception[" + ex.name + "]: " + ex.message);\r\n      }\r\n   return(strDn);\r\n   }\r\n\r\nfunction getDn(strName, strPassword)\r\n   {\r\n   var dn = "";\r\n\r\n   if(strName.toUpperCase().indexOf("CN", 0) == 0)\r\n      {\r\n      // Starts with a CN. Assume this is a DN so do not try to convert it.\r\n      return(dn);\r\n      }\r\n   if(servers.length == 0)\r\n      {\r\n', '      dn = get1779(strName, strPassword, "", ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_GC);   \r\n      }\r\n   else\r\n      {\r\n      var serverArray = servers.split(",");\r\n\r\n      for(var i=0; i<serverArray.length; i++)\r\n         {\r\n         try\r\n            {\r\n            dn ', '= get1779(strName, strPassword, serverArray[i], ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_SERVER);  \r\n            window.status = dn;\r\n            }\r\n         catch(ex)\r\n            {\r\n            dn = "";\r\n            window.status = "Exception[" + ex.name + "]: " + ex.message;\r\n            }\r\n\r\n         if(dn.length > 0)\r\n            {\r\n            break;\r\n            }\r\n         }\r\n      }\r\n\r\n   return(dn);\r\n   }\r\n\r\nfunction MakeCookie()\r\n{\r\n   var username = document.forms[0].UN.value;\r\n   var password = document.forms[0].PW.value;\r\n   var dn;\r\n\r\n   if((SecurityJumper == "REMOVED") || (username.length > 0)) \r\n      {\r\n      if(enabldap==2)\r\n         {\r\n         dn = getDn(username, password);\r\n         }\r\n      else\r\n         {\r\n         dn = "";\r\n         }\r\n\r\n      token = createToken(username, password, dn, sessionkey, sessionindex);\r\n      SetCookie(\'hp-iLO-Login\', token, \'/\', false, null, null);\r\n\r\n      return true;\r\n      } \r\n   else \r\n      {\r\n      alert(\'Invalid Username\');\r\n      return false;\r\n      }\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction createToken(user, pass, dn,']

Pad handles the remainder.\r\n   var len = str.length - str.length % 3;\r\n   var pad = str.length % 3;\r\n\r\n   for(i=0; i < len; i+=3) {\r\n      v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n      v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4) + ((str[i+1] & 0xf0) >>> 4);\r\n      v2 = ((str[i+1] & 0x0f) << 2) + ((str[i+2] & 0xc0) >>> 6);\r\n      v3 = (str[i+2] & 0x3f);\r\n      \r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v0);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v1);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v2);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v3);\r\n   }\r\n\r\n    // remainder padded with "="\r\n   switch(pad) {\r\n      default:\r\n      case 0:\r\n            break;\r\n      \r\n      case 1:\r\n            v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n            v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4);\r\n            sST += b64_str.charAt(v0) + b64_str.charAt(v1) + "==";\r\n            break;\r\n      \r\n      case 2:\r\n            v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n            v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4) + (', '(str[i+1] & 0xf0) >>> 4);\r\n            v2 = ((str[i+1] & 0x0f) << 2);\r\n            sST += b64_str.charAt(v0) + b64_str.charAt(v1) + b64_str.charAt(v2) + "=";\r\n            break;\r\n   }\r\n   return sST;\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction GetCookie(name)\r\n{\r\n   index = doc', 'ument.cookie.indexOf(name, 0);\r\n   if(index == -1) return null;\r\n   index += name.length + 1;\r\n   endex = document.cookie.indexOf(";", index);\r\n   if(endex == -1) endex = document.cookie.length;\r\n   return document.cookie.substring(index, endex);\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction SetCookie (name, value, path, secure, expires, domain)\r\n{\r\n   document.cookie = name + \r\n                      "=" +\r\n                      value +\r\n                      ((expires == null) ? "" : ("; expires=" + expires.toGMTString())) +\r\n                      ((path == null) ? "" : ("; path=" + path)) +\r\n                      ((domain == null) ? "" : ("; domain=" + domain)) +\r\n                      ((secure == true) ? "; secure" : "");\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction get1779(strName, strPassword, strServer, method)\r\n   {\r\n   var nto;\r\n   var strDn = "";\r\n   var strNetBIOSDomain = "";\r\n   var strUserName = "";\r\n\r\n   if(strName.indexOf("\\\\", 0) != -1)\r\n      {\r\n      strNetBIOSDomain = strName.slice(0, strName.indexOf("\\\\"));\r\n      strUserName      = strName.slice(strName.indexOf("\\\\")+1);\r\n   ', '   }\r\n   else if(strName.indexOf("@", 0) != -1)\r\n      {\r\n      strUserName      = strName.slice(0, strName.indexOf("@"));\r\n      strNetBIOSDomain = strName.slice(strName.indexOf("@")+1);\r\n      }\r\n   else\r\n      {\r\n      strUserName      = strName;', '\r\n      strNetBIOSDomain = "";\r\n      }\r\n\r\n   try\r\n      {\r\n      nto = new ActiveXObject("NameTranslate");\r\n      \r\n      // We are going to get the name from a server\r\n      if(method == ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_GC || strNetBIOSDomain.length == 0)\r\n         {\r\n         nto.Init(ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_GC, strServer);\r\n         }\r\n      else\r\n         {\r\n         nto.InitEx(ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_SERVER, strServer, strUserName, strNetBIOSDomain, strPassword);\r\n         }\r\n\r\n      // Give it a name\r\n      nto.Set(ADS_NAME_TYPE_UNKNOWN, strName);\r\n\r\n      // Get the name back in RFC 1779 format\r\n      strDn = nto.Get(ADS_NAME_TYPE_1779);\r\n      }\r\n   catch(ex)\r\n      {\r\n      window.status = ("Unable to get DN - Exception[" + ex.name + "]: " + ex.message);\r\n      }\r\n   return(strDn);\r\n   }\r\n\r\nfunction getDn(strName, strPassword)\r\n   {\r\n   var dn = "";\r\n\r\n   if(strName.toUpperCase().indexOf("CN", 0) == 0)\r\n      {\r\n      // Starts with a CN. Assume this is a DN so do not try to convert it.\r\n      return(dn);\r\n      }\r\n   if(servers.length == 0)\r\n      {\r\n', '      dn = get1779(strName, strPassword, "", ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_GC);   \r\n      }\r\n   else\r\n      {\r\n      var serverArray = servers.split(",");\r\n\r\n      for(var i=0; i<serverArray.length; i++)\r\n         {\r\n         try\r\n            {\r\n            dn ', '= get1779(strName, strPassword, serverArray[i], ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_SERVER);  \r\n            window.status = dn;\r\n            }\r\n         catch(ex)\r\n            {\r\n            dn = "";\r\n            window.status = "Exception[" + ex.name + "]: " + ex.message;\r\n            }\r\n\r\n         if(dn.length > 0)\r\n            {\r\n            break;\r\n            }\r\n         }\r\n      }\r\n\r\n   return(dn);\r\n   }\r\n\r\nfunction MakeCookie()\r\n{\r\n   var username = document.forms[0].UN.value;\r\n   var password = document.forms[0].PW.value;\r\n   var dn;\r\n\r\n   if((SecurityJumper == "REMOVED") || (username.length > 0)) \r\n      {\r\n      if(enabldap==2)\r\n         {\r\n         dn = getDn(username, password);\r\n         }\r\n      else\r\n         {\r\n         dn = "";\r\n         }\r\n\r\n      token = createToken(username, password, dn, sessionkey, sessionindex);\r\n      SetCookie(\'hp-iLO-Login\', token, \'/\', false, null, null);\r\n\r\n      return true;\r\n      } \r\n   else \r\n      {\r\n      alert(\'Invalid Username\');\r\n      return false;\r\n      }\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction createToken(user, pass, dn,', " key, index)\r\n{\r\n   var encoded_name = b64encode(user);\r\n   var encoded_pass = b64encode(pass);\r\n   var encoded_dn   = b64encode(dn);\r\n   var token        = index + ':' + encoded_name + ':' + encoded_pass + ':' + key;\r\n\r\n   if(encoded_dn.length > 0)"]

This will add a classname as a class selector, if it is not already present, and without deleting other unrelated classnames that might be present. \r\nfunction appendClassName(obj, newClassName) {\r\n\tif (obj.className.indexOf(newClassName)!=-1) return true;\r\n\tif (!obj.className) obj.className = newClassName;\r\n\telse obj.className = obj.className + " " + newClassName;\r\n}\r\nfunction removeClassName(obj, classNameToRemove) {\r\n\tvar', ' newClassName = obj.className.replace(" "+classNameToRemove,"");\r\n\tnewClassName = newClassName.replace(classNameToRemove+" ","");\r\n\tif (obj.className.length == newClassName.length) {\r\n\t\tnewClassName = newClassName.replace(classNameToRemove,"");\r\n\t}\r', '\n\tobj.className = newClassName;\r\n}\r\n', '</script>\r\n', '<SCRIPT language="javascript">', '\r\n<!--\\n//hide\r\n\r\nfunction b64encode(string)\r\n{\r\n   var v0, v1, v2, v3;\r\n   var sST = "";\r\n   var b64_str = \'ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz', '0123456789+/\';\r\n    \r\n   // convert string (input) to array of numbers\r\n   var str = new Array(string.length);\r\n   for (i=0; i<string.length; i++) {\r\n      str[i]= string.charCodeAt(i);\r\n   }\r\n   \r\n    // every three bytes in is 4 characters out.  Pad handles the remainder.\r\n   var len = str.length - str.length % 3;\r\n   var pad = str.length % 3;\r\n\r\n   for(i=0; i < len; i+=3) {\r\n      v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n      v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4) + ((str[i+1] & 0xf0) >>> 4);\r\n      v2 = ((str[i+1] & 0x0f) << 2) + ((str[i+2] & 0xc0) >>> 6);\r\n      v3 = (str[i+2] & 0x3f);\r\n      \r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v0);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v1);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v2);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v3);\r\n   }\r\n\r\n    // remainder padded with "="\r\n   switch(pad) {\r\n      default:\r\n      case 0:\r\n            break;\r\n      \r\n      case 1:\r\n            v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n            v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4);\r\n            sST += b64_str.charAt(v0) + b64_str.charAt(v1) + "==";\r\n            break;\r\n      \r\n      case 2:\r\n            v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n            v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4) + (', '(str[i+1] & 0xf0) >>> 4);\r\n            v2 = ((str[i+1] & 0x0f) << 2);\r\n            sST += b64_str.charAt(v0) + b64_str.charAt(v1) + b64_str.charAt(v2) + "=";\r\n            break;\r\n   }\r\n   return sST;\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction GetCookie(name)\r\n{\r\n   index = doc', 'ument.cookie.indexOf(name, 0);\r\n   if(index == -1) return null;\r\n   index += name.length + 1;\r\n   endex = document.cookie.indexOf(";", index);\r\n   if(endex == -1) endex = document.cookie.length;\r\n   return document.cookie.substring(index, endex);\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction SetCookie (name, value, path, secure, expires, domain)\r\n{\r\n   document.cookie = name + \r\n                      "=" +\r\n                      value +\r\n                      ((expires == null) ? "" : ("; expires=" + expires.toGMTString())) +\r\n                      ((path == null) ? "" : ("; path=" + path)) +\r\n                      ((domain == null) ? "" : ("; domain=" + domain)) +\r\n                      ((secure == true) ? "; secure" : "");\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction get1779(strName, strPassword, strServer, method)\r\n   {\r\n   var nto;\r\n   var strDn = "";\r\n   var strNetBIOSDomain = "";\r\n   var strUserName = "";\r\n\r\n   if(strName.indexOf("\\\\", 0) != -1)\r\n      {\r\n      strNetBIOSDomain = strName.slice(0, strName.indexOf("\\\\"));\r\n      strUserName      = strName.slice(strName.indexOf("\\\\")+1);\r\n   ', '   }\r\n   else if(strName.indexOf("@", 0) != -1)\r\n      {\r\n      strUserName      = strName.slice(0, strName.indexOf("@"));\r\n      strNetBIOSDomain = strName.slice(strName.indexOf("@")+1);\r\n      }\r\n   else\r\n      {\r\n      strUserName      = strName;', '\r\n      strNetBIOSDomain = "";\r\n      }\r\n\r\n   try\r\n      {\r\n      nto = new ActiveXObject("NameTranslate");\r\n      \r\n      // We are going to get the name from a server\r\n      if(method == ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_GC || strNetBIOSDomain.length == 0)\r\n         {\r\n         nto.Init(ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_GC, strServer);\r\n         }\r\n      else\r\n         {\r\n         nto.InitEx(ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_SERVER, strServer, strUserName, strNetBIOSDomain, strPassword);\r\n         }\r\n\r\n      // Give it a name\r\n      nto.Set(ADS_NAME_TYPE_UNKNOWN, strName);\r\n\r\n      // Get the name back in RFC 1779 format\r\n      strDn = nto.Get(ADS_NAME_TYPE_1779);\r\n      }\r\n   catch(ex)\r\n      {\r\n      window.status = ("Unable to get DN - Exception[" + ex.name + "]: " + ex.message);\r\n      }\r\n   return(strDn);\r\n   }\r\n\r\nfunction getDn(strName, strPassword)\r\n   {\r\n   var dn = "";\r\n\r\n   if(strName.toUpperCase().indexOf("CN", 0) == 0)\r\n      {\r\n      // Starts with a CN. }\r\n\r\n   return(dn);\r\n   }\r\n\r\nfunction MakeCookie()\r\n{\r\n   var username = document.forms[0].UN.value;\r\n   var password = document.forms[0].PW.value;\r\n   var dn;\r\n\r\n Pad handles the remainder.\r\n   var len = str.length - str.length % 3;\r\n   var pad = str.length % 3;\r\n\r\n   for(i=0; i < len; i+=3) {\r\n      v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n      v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4) + ((str[i+1] & 0xf0) >>> 4);\r\n      v2 = ((str[i+1] & 0x0f) << 2) + ((str[i+2] & 0xc0) >>> 6);\r\n      v3 = (str[i+2] & 0x3f);\r\n      \r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v0);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v1);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v2);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v3);\r\n   }\r\n\r\n    // remainder padded with "="\r\n   switch(pad) {\r\n      default:\r\n      case 0:\r\n            break;\r\n      \r\n      case 1:\r\n            v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n            v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4);\r\n            sST += b64_str.charAt(v0) + b64_str.charAt(v1) + "==";\r\n            break;\r\n      \r\n      case 2:\r\n            v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n            v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4) + (', '(str[i+1] & 0xf0) >>> 4);\r\n            v2 = ((str[i+1] & 0x0f) << 2);\r\n            sST += b64_str.charAt(v0) + b64_str.charAt(v1) + b64_str.charAt(v2) + "=";\r\n            break;\r\n   }\r\n   return sST;\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction GetCookie(name)\r\n{\r\n   index = doc', 'ument.cookie.indexOf(name, 0);\r\n   if(index == -1) return null;\r\n   index += name.length + 1;\r\n   endex = document.cookie.indexOf(";", index);\r\n   if(endex == -1) endex = document.cookie.length;\r\n   return document.cookie.substring(index, endex);\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction SetCookie (name, value, path, secure, expires, domain)\r\n{\r\n   document.cookie = name + \r\n                      "=" +\r\n                      value +\r\n                      ((expires == null) ? Pad handles the remainder.\r\n   var len = str.length - str.length % 3;\r\n   var pad = str.length % 3;\r\n\r\n   for(i=0; i < len; i+=3) {\r\n      v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n      v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4) + ((str[i+1] & 0xf0) >>> 4);\r\n      v2 = ((str[i+1] & 0x0f) << 2) + ((str[i+2] & 0xc0) >>> 6);\r\n      v3 = (str[i+2] & 0x3f);\r\n      \r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v0);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v1);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v2);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v3);\r\n   }\r\n\r\n    // remainder padded with "="\r\n   switch(pad) {\r\n      default:\r\n      case 0:\r\n            break;\r\n      \r\n      case 1:\r\n            v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n            v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4);\r\n            sST += b64_str.charAt(v0) + b64_str.charAt(v1) + "==";\r\n            break;\r\n      \r\n      case 2:\r\n            v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n            v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4) + (', '(str[i+1] & 0xf0) >>> 4);\r\n            v2 = ((str[i+1] & 0x0f) << 2);\r\n            sST += b64_str.charAt(v0) + b64_str.charAt(v1) + b64_str.charAt(v2) + "=";\r\n            break;\r\n   }\r\n   return sST;\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction GetCookie(name)\r\n{\r\n   index = doc', 'ument.cookie.indexOf(name, 0);\r\n   if(index == -1) return null;\r\n   index += name.length + 1;\r\n   endex = document.cookie.indexOf(";", index);\r\n   if(endex == -1) endex = document.cookie.length;\r\n   return document.cookie.substring(index, endex);\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction SetCookie (name, value, path, secure, expires, domain)\r\n{\r\n   document.cookie = name + \r\n                      "=" +\r\n                      value +\r\n                      ((expires == null) ? "; secure" : "");\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction get1779(strName, strPassword, strServer, method)\r\n   {\r\n   var nto;\r\n   var strDn = "";\r\n   var strNetBIOSDomain = "";\r\n   var strUserName = "";\r\n\r\n   if(strName.indexOf("\\\\", 0) != -1)\r\n      {\r\n      strNetBIOSDomain = strName.slice(0, strName.indexOf("\\\\"));\r\n      strUserName      = strName.slice(strName.indexOf("\\\\")+1);\r\n   ', '   }\r\n   else if(strName.indexOf("@", 0) != -1)\r\n      {\r\n      strUserName      = strName.slice(0, strName.indexOf("@"));\r\n      strNetBIOSDomain = strName.slice(strName.indexOf("@")+1);\r\n      }\r\n   else\r\n      {\r\n      strUserName      = strName;', '\r\n      strNetBIOSDomain = "";\r\n      }\r\n\r\n   try\r\n      {\r\n      nto = new ActiveXObject("NameTranslate");\r\n      \r\n      // We are going to get the name from a server\r\n      if(method == ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_GC || strNetBIOSDomain.length == 0)\r\n         {\r\n         nto.Init(ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_GC, strServer);\r\n         }\r\n      else\r\n         {\r\n         nto.InitEx(ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_SERVER, strServer, strUserName, strNetBIOSDomain, strPassword);\r\n         }\r\n\r\n      // Give it a name\r\n      nto.Set(ADS_NAME_TYPE_UNKNOWN, strName);\r\n\r\n      // Get the name back in RFC 1779 format\r\n      strDn = nto.Get(ADS_NAME_TYPE_1779);\r\n      }\r\n   catch(ex)\r\n      {\r\n      window.status = ("Unable to get DN - Exception[" + ex.name + "]: " + ex.message);\r\n      }\r\n   return(strDn);\r\n   }\r\n\r\nfunction getDn(strName, strPassword)\r\n   {\r\n   var dn = "";\r\n\r\n   if(strName.toUpperCase().indexOf("CN", 0) == 0)\r\n      {\r\n      // Starts with a CN. }\r\n\r\n   return(dn);\r\n   }\r\n\r\nfunction MakeCookie()\r\n{\r\n   var username = document.forms[0].UN.value;\r\n   var password = document.forms[0].PW.value;\r\n   var dn;\r\n\r\n This will add a classname as a class selector, if it is not already present, and without deleting other unrelated classnames that might be present. \r\nfunction appendClassName(obj, newClassName) {\r\n\tif (obj.className.indexOf(newClassName)!=-1) return true;\r\n\tif (!obj.className) obj.className = newClassName;\r\n\telse obj.className = obj.className + " " + newClassName;\r\n}\r\nfunction removeClassName(obj, classNameToRemove) {\r\n\tvar', ' newClassName = obj.className.replace(" "+classNameToRemove,"");\r\n\tnewClassName = newClassName.replace(classNameToRemove+" ","");\r\n\tif (obj.className.length == newClassName.length) {\r\n\t\tnewClassName = newClassName.replace(classNameToRemove,"");\r\n\t}\r', '\n\tobj.className = newClassName;\r\n}\r\n', '</script>\r\n', '<SCRIPT language="javascript">', '\r\n<!--\\n//hide\r\n\r\nfunction b64encode(string)\r\n{\r\n   var v0, v1, v2, v3;\r\n   var sST = "";\r\n   var b64_str = \'ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz', '0123456789+/\';\r\n    \r\n   // convert string (input) to array of numbers\r\n   var str = new Array(string.length);\r\n   for (i=0; i<string.length; i++) {\r\n      str[i]= string.charCodeAt(i);\r\n   }\r\n   \r\n    // every three bytes in is 4 characters out.  Pad handles the remainder.\r\n   var len = str.length - str.length % 3;\r\n   var pad = str.length % 3;\r\n\r\n   for(i=0; i < len; i+=3) {\r\n      v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n      v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4) + ((str[i+1] & 0xf0) >>> 4);\r\n      v2 = ((str[i+1] & 0x0f) << 2) + ((str[i+2] & 0xc0) >>> 6);\r\n      v3 = (str[i+2] & 0x3f);\r\n      \r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v0);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v1);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v2);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v3);\r\n   }\r\n\r\n    // remainder padded with "="\r\n   switch(pad) {\r\n      default:\r\n      case 0:\r\n            break;\r\n      \r\n      case 1:\r\n            v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n            v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4);\r\n            sST += b64_str.charAt(v0) + b64_str.charAt(v1) + "==";\r\n            break;\r\n      \r\n      case 2:\r\n            v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n            v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4) + (', '(str[i+1] & 0xf0) >>> 4);\r\n            v2 = ((str[i+1] & 0x0f) << 2);\r\n            sST += b64_str.charAt(v0) + b64_str.charAt(v1) + b64_str.charAt(v2) + "=";\r\n            break;\r\n   }\r\n   return sST;\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction GetCookie(name)\r\n{\r\n   index = doc', 'ument.cookie.indexOf(name, 0);\r\n   if(index == -1) return null;\r\n   index += name.length + 1;\r\n   endex = document.cookie.indexOf(";", index);\r\n   if(endex == -1) endex = document.cookie.length;\r\n   return document.cookie.substring(index, endex);\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction SetCookie (name, value, path, secure, expires, domain)\r\n{\r\n   document.cookie = name + \r\n                      "=" +\r\n                      value +\r\n                      ((expires == null) ? "" : ("; expires=" + expires.toGMTString())) +\r\n                      ((path == null) ? "" : ("; path=" + path)) +\r\n                      ((domain == null) ? "" : ("; domain=" + domain)) +\r\n                      ((secure == true) ? "; secure" : "");\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction get1779(strName, strPassword, strServer, method)\r\n   {\r\n   var nto;\r\n   var strDn = "";\r\n   var strNetBIOSDomain = "";\r\n   var strUserName = "";\r\n\r\n   if(strName.indexOf("\\\\", 0) != -1)\r\n      {\r\n      strNetBIOSDomain = strName.slice(0, strName.indexOf("\\\\"));\r\n      strUserName      = strName.slice(strName.indexOf("\\\\")+1);\r\n   ', '   }\r\n   else if(strName.indexOf("@", 0) != -1)\r\n      {\r\n      strUserName      = strName.slice(0, strName.indexOf("@"));\r\n      strNetBIOSDomain = strName.slice(strName.indexOf("@")+1);\r\n      }\r\n   else\r\n      {\r\n      strUserName      = strName;', '\r\n      strNetBIOSDomain = "";\r\n      }\r\n\r\n   try\r\n      {\r\n      nto = new ActiveXObject("NameTranslate");\r\n      \r\n      // We are going to get the name from a server\r\n      if(method == ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_GC || strNetBIOSDomain.length == 0)\r\n         {\r\n         nto.Init(ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_GC, strServer);\r\n         }\r\n      else\r\n         {\r\n         nto.InitEx(ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_SERVER, strServer, strUserName, strNetBIOSDomain, strPassword);\r\n         }\r\n\r\n      // Give it a name\r\n      nto.Set(ADS_NAME_TYPE_UNKNOWN, strName);\r\n\r\n      // Get the name back in RFC 1779 format\r\n      strDn = nto.Get(ADS_NAME_TYPE_1779);\r\n      }\r\n   catch(ex)\r\n      {\r\n      window.status = ("Unable to get DN - Exception[" + ex.name + "]: " + ex.message);\r\n      }\r\n   return(strDn);\r\n   }\r\n\r\nfunction getDn(strName, strPassword)\r\n   {\r\n   var dn = "";\r\n\r\n   if(strName.toUpperCase().indexOf("CN", 0) == 0)\r\n      {\r\n      // Starts with a CN. Assume this is a DN so do not try to convert it.\r\n      return(dn);\r\n      }\r\n   if(servers.length == 0)\r\n      {\r\n', '      dn = get1779(strName, strPassword, "", ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_GC);   \r\n      }\r\n   else\r\n      {\r\n      var serverArray = servers.split(",");\r\n\r\n      for(var i=0; i<serverArray.length; i++)\r\n         {\r\n         try\r\n            {\r\n            dn ', '= get1779(strName, strPassword, serverArray[i], ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_SERVER);  \r\n            window.status = dn;\r\n            }\r\n         catch(ex)\r\n            {\r\n            dn = "";\r\n            window.status = "Exception[" + ex.name + "]: " + ex.message;\r\n            }\r\n\r\n         if(dn.length > 0)\r\n            {\r\n            break;\r\n            }\r\n         }\r\n      }\r\n\r\n   return(dn);\r\n   }\r\n\r\nfunction MakeCookie()\r\n{\r\n   var username = document.forms[0].UN.value;\r\n   var password = document.forms[0].PW.value;\r\n   var dn;\r\n\r\n return true;\r\n      } \r\n   else \r\n      {\r\n      alert(\'Invalid Username\');\r\n      return false;\r\n      }\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction createToken(user, pass, dn,', " key, index)\r\n{\r\n   var encoded_dn;\r\n   return(token);\r\n}\r\n\r\nvar currentFocus;\r\n\r\nif (!ie)\r\n{\r\n   document.captureEvents(Event.KEYPRESS | Event.KEYDOWN);\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction setFocus(backward)\r\n{\r\n    if This will add a classname as a class selector, if it is not already present, and without deleting other unrelated classnames that might be present. \r\nfunction appendClassName(obj, newClassName) {\r\n\tif (obj.className.indexOf(newClassName)!=-1) return true;\r\n\tif (!obj.className) obj.className = newClassName;\r\n\telse obj.className = obj.className + " " + newClassName;\r\n}\r\nfunction removeClassName(obj, classNameToRemove) {\r\n\tvar', ' newClassName = obj.className.replace(" "+classNameToRemove,"");\r\n\tnewClassName = newClassName.replace(classNameToRemove+" ","");\r\n\tif (obj.className.length == newClassName.length) {\r\n\t\tnewClassName = newClassName.replace(classNameToRemove,"");\r\n\t}\r', '\n\tobj.className = newClassName;\r\n}\r\n', '</script>\r\n', '<SCRIPT language="javascript">', '\r\n<!--\\n//hide\r\n\r\nfunction b64encode(string)\r\n{\r\n   var v0, v1, v2, v3;\r\n   var sST = "";\r\n   var b64_str = \'ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz', '0123456789+/\';\r\n    \r\n   // convert string (input) to array of numbers\r\n   var str = new Array(string.length);\r\n   for (i=0; i<string.length; i++) {\r\n      str[i]= string.charCodeAt(i);\r\n   }\r\n   \r\n    // every three bytes in is 4 characters out.  Pad handles the remainder.\r\n   var len = str.length - str.length % 3;\r\n   var pad = str.length % 3;\r\n\r\n   for(i=0; i < len; i+=3) {\r\n      v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n      v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4) + ((str[i+1] & 0xf0) >>> 4);\r\n      v2 = ((str[i+1] & 0x0f) << 2) + ((str[i+2] & 0xc0) >>> 6);\r\n      v3 = (str[i+2] & 0x3f);\r\n      \r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v0);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v1);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v2);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v3);\r\n   }\r\n\r\n    // remainder padded with "="\r\n   switch(pad) {\r\n      default:\r\n      case 0:\r\n            break;\r\n      \r\n      case 1:\r\n            v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n            v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4);\r\n            sST += b64_str.charAt(v0) + b64_str.charAt(v1) + "==";\r\n            break;\r\n      \r\n      case 2:\r\n            v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n            v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4) + (', '(str[i+1] & 0xf0) >>> 4);\r\n            v2 = ((str[i+1] & 0x0f) << 2);\r\n            sST += b64_str.charAt(v0) + b64_str.charAt(v1) + b64_str.charAt(v2) + "=";\r\n            break;\r\n   }\r\n   return sST;\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction GetCookie(name)\r\n{\r\n   index = doc', 'ument.cookie.indexOf(name, 0);\r\n   if(index == -1) return null;\r\n   index += name.length + 1;\r\n   endex = document.cookie.indexOf(";", index);\r\n   if(endex == -1) endex = document.cookie.length;\r\n   return document.cookie.substring(index, endex);\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction SetCookie (name, value, path, secure, expires, domain)\r\n{\r\n   document.cookie = name + \r\n                      "=" +\r\n                      value +\r\n                      ((expires == null) ? "" : ("; expires=" + expires.toGMTString())) +\r\n                      ((path == null) ? "" : ("; path=" + path)) +\r\n                      ((domain == null) ? "" : ("; domain=" + domain)) +\r\n                      ((secure == true) ? "; secure" : "");\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction get1779(strName, strPassword, strServer, method)\r\n   {\r\n   var nto;\r\n   var strDn = "";\r\n   var strNetBIOSDomain = "";\r\n   var strUserName = "";\r\n\r\n   if(strName.indexOf("\\\\", 0) != -1)\r\n      {\r\n      strNetBIOSDomain = strName.slice(0, strName.indexOf("\\\\"));\r\n      strUserName      = strName.slice(strName.indexOf("\\\\")+1);\r\n   ', '   }\r\n   else if(strName.indexOf("@", 0) != -1)\r\n      {\r\n      strUserName      = strName.slice(0, strName.indexOf("@"));\r\n      strNetBIOSDomain = strName.slice(strName.indexOf("@")+1);\r\n      }\r\n   else\r\n      {\r\n      strUserName      = strName;', '\r\n      strNetBIOSDomain = "";\r\n      }\r\n\r\n   try\r\n      {\r\n      nto = new ActiveXObject("NameTranslate");\r\n      \r\n      // We are going to get the name from a server\r\n      if(method == ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_GC || strNetBIOSDomain.length == 0)\r\n         {\r\n         nto.Init(ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_GC, strServer);\r\n         }\r\n      else\r\n         {\r\n         nto.InitEx(ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_SERVER, strServer, strUserName, strNetBIOSDomain, strPassword);\r\n         }\r\n\r\n      // Give it a name\r\n      nto.Set(ADS_NAME_TYPE_UNKNOWN, strName);\r\n\r\n      // Get the name back in RFC 1779 format\r\n      strDn = nto.Get(ADS_NAME_TYPE_1779);\r\n      }\r\n   catch(ex)\r\n      {\r\n      window.status = ("Unable to get DN - Exception[" + ex.name + "]: " + ex.message);\r\n      }\r\n   return(strDn);\r\n   }\r\n\r\nfunction getDn(strName, strPassword)\r\n   {\r\n   var dn = "";\r\n\r\n   if(strName.toUpperCase().indexOf("CN", 0) == 0)\r\n      {\r\n      // Starts with a CN. }\r\n\r\n   return(dn);\r\n   }\r\n\r\nfunction MakeCookie()\r\n{\r\n   var username = document.forms[0].UN.value;\r\n   var password = document.forms[0].PW.value;\r\n   var dn;\r\n\r\n Pad handles the remainder.\r\n   var len = str.length - str.length % 3;\r\n   var pad = str.length % 3;\r\n\r\n   for(i=0; i < len; i+=3) {\r\n      v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n      v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4) + ((str[i+1] & 0xf0) >>> 4);\r\n      v2 = ((str[i+1] & 0x0f) << 2) + ((str[i+2] & 0xc0) >>> 6);\r\n      v3 = (str[i+2] & 0x3f);\r\n      \r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v0);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v1);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v2);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v3);\r\n   }\r\n\r\n    // remainder padded with "="\r\n   switch(pad) {\r\n      default:\r\n      case 0:\r\n            break;\r\n      \r\n      case 1:\r\n            v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n            v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4);\r\n            sST += b64_str.charAt(v0) + b64_str.charAt(v1) + "==";\r\n            break;\r\n      \r\n      case 2:\r\n            v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n            v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4) + (', '(str[i+1] & 0xf0) >>> 4);\r\n            v2 = ((str[i+1] & 0x0f) << 2);\r\n            sST += b64_str.charAt(v0) + b64_str.charAt(v1) + b64_str.charAt(v2) + "=";\r\n            break;\r\n   }\r\n   return sST;\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction GetCookie(name)\r\n{\r\n   index = doc', 'ument.cookie.indexOf(name, 0);\r\n   if(index == -1) return null;\r\n   index += name.length + 1;\r\n   endex = document.cookie.indexOf(";", index);\r\n   if(endex == -1) endex = document.cookie.length;\r\n   return document.cookie.substring(index, endex);\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction SetCookie (name, value, path, secure, expires, domain)\r\n{\r\n   document.cookie = name + \r\n                      "=" +\r\n                      value +\r\n                      ((expires == null) ? Pad handles the remainder.\r\n   var len = str.length - str.length % 3;\r\n   var pad = str.length % 3;\r\n\r\n   for(i=0; i < len; i+=3) {\r\n      v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n      v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4) + ((str[i+1] & 0xf0) >>> 4);\r\n      v2 = ((str[i+1] & 0x0f) << 2) + ((str[i+2] & 0xc0) >>> 6);\r\n      v3 = (str[i+2] & 0x3f);\r\n      \r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v0);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v1);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v2);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v3);\r\n   }\r\n\r\n    // remainder padded with "="\r\n   switch(pad) {\r\n      default:\r\n      case 0:\r\n            break;\r\n      \r\n      case 1:\r\n            v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n            v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4);\r\n            sST += b64_str.charAt(v0) + b64_str.charAt(v1) + "==";\r\n            break;\r\n      \r\n      case 2:\r\n            v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n            v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4) + (', '(str[i+1] & 0xf0) >>> 4);\r\n            v2 = ((str[i+1] & 0x0f) << 2);\r\n            sST += b64_str.charAt(v0) + b64_str.charAt(v1) + b64_str.charAt(v2) + "=";\r\n            break;\r\n   }\r\n   return sST;\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction GetCookie(name)\r\n{\r\n   index = doc', 'ument.cookie.indexOf(name, 0);\r\n   if(index == -1) return null;\r\n   index += name.length + 1;\r\n   endex = document.cookie.indexOf(";", index);\r\n   if(endex == -1) endex = document.cookie.length;\r\n   return document.cookie.substring(index, endex);\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction SetCookie (name, value, path, secure, expires, domain)\r\n{\r\n   document.cookie = name + \r\n                      "=" +\r\n                      value +\r\n                      ((expires == null) ? "" : ("; expires=" + expires.toGMTString())) +\r\n                      ((path == null) ? "" : ("; path=" + path)) +\r\n                      ((domain == null) ? "" : ("; domain=" + domain)) +\r\n                      ((secure == true) ? "; secure" : "");\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction get1779(strName, strPassword, strServer, method)\r\n   {\r\n   var nto;\r\n   var strDn = "";\r\n   var strNetBIOSDomain = "";\r\n   var strUserName = "";\r\n\r\n   if(strName.indexOf("\\\\", 0) != -1)\r\n      {\r\n      strNetBIOSDomain = strName.slice(0, strName.indexOf("\\\\"));\r\n      strUserName      = strName.slice(strName.indexOf("\\\\")+1);\r\n   ', '   }\r\n   else if(strName.indexOf("@", 0) != -1)\r\n      {\r\n      strUserName      = strName.slice(0, strName.indexOf("@"));\r\n      strNetBIOSDomain = strName.slice(strName.indexOf("@")+1);\r\n      }\r\n   else\r\n      {\r\n      strUserName      = strName;', '\r\n      strNetBIOSDomain = "";\r\n      }\r\n\r\n   try\r\n      {\r\n      nto = new ActiveXObject("NameTranslate");\r\n      \r\n      // We are going to get the name from a server\r\n      if(method == ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_GC || strNetBIOSDomain.length == 0)\r\n         {\r\n         nto.Init(ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_GC, strServer);\r\n         }\r\n      else\r\n         {\r\n         nto.InitEx(ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_SERVER, strServer, strUserName, strNetBIOSDomain, strPassword);\r\n         }\r\n\r\n      // Give it a name\r\n      nto.Set(ADS_NAME_TYPE_UNKNOWN, strName);\r\n\r\n      // Get the name back in RFC 1779 format\r\n      strDn = nto.Get(ADS_NAME_TYPE_1779);\r\n      }\r\n   catch(ex)\r\n      {\r\n      window.status = ("Unable to get DN - Exception[" + ex.name + "]: " + ex.message);\r\n      }\r\n   return(strDn);\r\n   }\r\n\r\nfunction getDn(strName, strPassword)\r\n   {\r\n   var dn = "";\r\n\r\n   if(strName.toUpperCase().indexOf("CN", 0) == 0)\r\n      {\r\n      // Starts with a CN. }\r\n\r\n   return(dn);\r\n   }\r\n\r\nfunction MakeCookie()\r\n{\r\n   var username = document.forms[0].UN.value;\r\n   var password = document.forms[0].PW.value;\r\n   var dn;\r\n\r\n Pad handles the remainder.\r\n   var len = str.length - str.length % 3;\r\n   var pad = str.length % 3;\r\n\r\n   for(i=0; i < len; i+=3) {\r\n      v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n      v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4) + ((str[i+1] & 0xf0) >>> 4);\r\n      v2 = ((str[i+1] & 0x0f) << 2) + ((str[i+2] & 0xc0) >>> 6);\r\n      v3 = (str[i+2] & 0x3f);\r\n      \r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v0);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v1);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v2);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v3);\r\n   }\r\n\r\n    // remainder padded with "="\r\n   switch(pad) {\r\n      default:\r\n      case 0:\r\n            break;\r\n      \r\n      case 1:\r\n            v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n            v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4);\r\n            sST += b64_str.charAt(v0) + b64_str.charAt(v1) + "==";\r\n            break;\r\n      \r\n      case 2:\r\n            v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n            v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4) + (', '(str[i+1] & 0xf0) >>> 4);\r\n            v2 = ((str[i+1] & 0x0f) << 2);\r\n            sST += b64_str.charAt(v0) + b64_str.charAt(v1) + b64_str.charAt(v2) + "=";\r\n            break;\r\n   }\r\n   return sST;\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction GetCookie(name)\r\n{\r\n   index = doc', 'ument.cookie.indexOf(name, 0);\r\n   if(index == -1) return null;\r\n   index += name.length + 1;\r\n   endex = document.cookie.indexOf(";", index);\r\n   if(endex == -1) endex = document.cookie.length;\r\n   return document.cookie.substring(index, endex);\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction SetCookie (name, value, path, secure, expires, domain)\r\n{\r\n   document.cookie = name + \r\n                      "=" +\r\n                      value +\r\n                      ((expires == null) ? "" : ("; expires=" + expires.toGMTString())) +\r\n                      ((path == null) ? "" : ("; path=" + path)) +\r\n                      ((domain == null) ? "" : ("; domain=" + domain)) +\r\n                      ((secure == true) ? "; secure" : "");\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction get1779(strName, strPassword, strServer, method)\r\n   {\r\n   var nto;\r\n   var strDn = "";\r\n   var strNetBIOSDomain = "";\r\n   var strUserName = "";\r\n\r\n   if(strName.indexOf("\\\\", 0) != -1)\r\n      {\r\n      strNetBIOSDomain = strName.slice(0, strName.indexOf("\\\\"));\r\n      strUserName      = strName.slice(strName.indexOf("\\\\")+1);\r\n   ', '   }\r\n   else if(strName.indexOf("@", 0) != -1)\r\n      {\r\n      strUserName      = strName.slice(0, strName.indexOf("@"));\r\n      strNetBIOSDomain = strName.slice(strName.indexOf("@")+1);\r\n      }\r\n   else\r\n      {\r\n      strUserName      = strName;', '\r\n      strNetBIOSDomain = "";\r\n      }\r\n\r\n   try\r\n      {\r\n      nto = new ActiveXObject("NameTranslate");\r\n      \r\n      // We are going to get the name from a server\r\n      if(method == ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_GC || strNetBIOSDomain.length == 0)\r\n         {\r\n         nto.Init(ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_GC, strServer);\r\n         }\r\n      else\r\n         {\r\n         nto.InitEx(ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_SERVER, strServer, strUserName, strNetBIOSDomain, strPassword);\r\n         }\r\n\r\n      // Give it a name\r\n      nto.Set(ADS_NAME_TYPE_UNKNOWN, strName);\r\n\r\n      // Get the name back in RFC 1779 format\r\n      strDn = nto.Get(ADS_NAME_TYPE_1779);\r\n      }\r\n   catch(ex)\r\n      {\r\n      window.status = ("Unable to get DN - Exception[" + ex.name + "]: " + ex.message);\r\n      }\r\n   return(strDn);\r\n   }\r\n\r\nfunction getDn(strName, strPassword)\r\n   {\r\n   var dn = "";\r\n\r\n   if(strName.toUpperCase().indexOf("CN", 0) == 0)\r\n      {\r\n      // Starts with a CN. Assume this is a DN so do not try to convert it.\r\n      return(dn);\r\n      }\r\n   if(servers.length == 0)\r\n      {\r\n', '      dn = get1779(strName, strPassword, "", ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_GC);   \r\n      }\r\n   else\r\n      {\r\n      var serverArray = servers.split(",");\r\n\r\n      for(var i=0; i<serverArray.length; i++)\r\n         {\r\n         try\r\n            {\r\n            dn ', '= get1779(strName, strPassword, serverArray[i], ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_SERVER);  \r\n            window.status = dn;\r\n            }\r\n         catch(ex)\r\n            {\r\n            dn = "";\r\n            window.status = "Exception[" + ex.name + "]: " + ex.message;\r\n            }\r\n\r\n         if(dn.length > 0)\r\n            {\r\n            break;\r\n            }\r\n         }\r\n      }\r\n\r\n   return(dn);\r\n   }\r\n\r\nfunction MakeCookie()\r\n{\r\n   var username = document.forms[0].UN.value;\r\n   var password = document.forms[0].PW.value;\r\n   var dn;\r\n\r\n Pad handles the remainder.\r\n   var len = str.length - str.length % 3;\r\n   var pad = str.length % 3;\r\n\r\n   for(i=0; i < len; i+=3) {\r\n      v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n      v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4) + ((str[i+1] & 0xf0) >>> 4);\r\n      v2 = ((str[i+1] & 0x0f) << 2) + ((str[i+2] & 0xc0) >>> 6);\r\n      v3 = (str[i+2] & 0x3f);\r\n      \r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v0);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v1);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v2);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v3);\r\n   }\r\n\r\n    // remainder padded with "="\r\n   switch(pad) {\r\n      default:\r\n      case 0:\r\n            break;\r\n      \r\n      case 1:\r\n            v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n            v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4);\r\n            sST += b64_str.charAt(v0) + b64_str.charAt(v1) + "==";\r\n            break;\r\n      \r\n      case 2:\r\n            v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n            v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4) + (', '(str[i+1] & 0xf0) >>> 4);\r\n            v2 = ((str[i+1] & 0x0f) << 2);\r\n            sST += b64_str.charAt(v0) + b64_str.charAt(v1) + b64_str.charAt(v2) + "=";\r\n            break;\r\n   }\r\n   return sST;\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction GetCookie(name)\r\n{\r\n   index = doc', 'ument.cookie.indexOf(name, 0);\r\n   if(index == -1) return null;\r\n   index += name.length + 1;\r\n   endex = document.cookie.indexOf(";", index);\r\n   if(endex == -1) endex = document.cookie.length;\r\n   return document.cookie.substring(index, endex);\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction SetCookie (name, value, path, secure, expires, domain)\r\n{\r\n   document.cookie = name + \r\n                      "=" +\r\n                      value +\r\n                      ((expires == null) ? "" : ("; expires=" + expires.toGMTString())) +\r\n                      ((path == null) ? "" : ("; path=" + path)) +\r\n                      ((domain == null) ? "" : ("; domain=" + domain)) +\r\n                      ((secure == true) ? "; secure" : "");\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction get1779(strName, strPassword, strServer, method)\r\n   {\r\n   var nto;\r\n   var strDn = "";\r\n   var strNetBIOSDomain = "";\r\n   var strUserName = "";\r\n\r\n   if(strName.indexOf("\\\\", 0) != -1)\r\n      {\r\n      strNetBIOSDomain = strName.slice(0, strName.indexOf("\\\\"));\r\n      strUserName      = strName.slice(strName.indexOf("\\\\")+1);\r\n   ', '   }\r\n   else if(strName.indexOf("@", 0) != -1)\r\n      {\r\n      strUserName      = strName.slice(0, strName.indexOf("@"));\r\n      strNetBIOSDomain = strName.slice(strName.indexOf("@")+1);\r\n      }\r\n   else\r\n      {\r\n      strUserName      = strName;', '\r\n      strNetBIOSDomain = "";\r\n      }\r\n\r\n   try\r\n      {\r\n      nto = new ActiveXObject("NameTranslate");\r\n      \r\n      // We are going to get the name from a server\r\n      if(method == ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_GC || strNetBIOSDomain.length == 0)\r\n         {\r\n         nto.Init(ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_GC, strServer);\r\n         }\r\n      else\r\n         {\r\n         nto.InitEx(ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_SERVER, strServer, strUserName, strNetBIOSDomain, strPassword);\r\n         }\r\n\r\n      // Give it a name\r\n      nto.Set(ADS_NAME_TYPE_UNKNOWN, strName);\r\n\r\n      // Get the name back in RFC 1779 format\r\n      strDn = nto.Get(ADS_NAME_TYPE_1779);\r\n      }\r\n   catch(ex)\r\n      {\r\n      window.status = ("Unable to get DN - Exception[" + ex.name + "]: " + ex.message);\r\n      }\r\n   return(strDn);\r\n   }\r\n\r\nfunction getDn(strName, strPassword)\r\n   {\r\n   var dn = "";\r\n\r\n   if(strName.toUpperCase().indexOf("CN", 0) == 0)\r\n      {\r\n      // Starts with a CN. }\r\n\r\n   return(dn);\r\n   }\r\n\r\nfunction MakeCookie()\r\n{\r\n   var username = document.forms[0].UN.value;\r\n   var password = document.forms[0].PW.value;\r\n   var dn;\r\n\r\n Pad handles the remainder.\r\n   var len = str.length - str.length % 3;\r\n   var pad = str.length % 3;\r\n\r\n   for(i=0; i < len; i+=3) {\r\n      v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n      v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4) + ((str[i+1] & 0xf0) >>> 4);\r\n      v2 = ((str[i+1] & 0x0f) << 2) + ((str[i+2] & 0xc0) >>> 6);\r\n      v3 = (str[i+2] & 0x3f);\r\n      \r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v0);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v1);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v2);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v3);\r\n   }\r\n\r\n    // remainder padded with "="\r\n   switch(pad) {\r\n      default:\r\n      case 0:\r\n            break;\r\n      \r\n      case 1:\r\n            v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n            v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4);\r\n            sST += b64_str.charAt(v0) + b64_str.charAt(v1) + "==";\r\n            break;\r\n      \r\n      case 2:\r\n            v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n            v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4) + (', '(str[i+1] & 0xf0) >>> 4);\r\n            v2 = ((str[i+1] & 0x0f) << 2);\r\n            sST += b64_str.charAt(v0) + b64_str.charAt(v1) + b64_str.charAt(v2) + "=";\r\n            break;\r\n   }\r\n   return sST;\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction GetCookie(name)\r\n{\r\n   index = doc', 'ument.cookie.indexOf(name, 0);\r\n   if(index == -1) return null;\r\n   index += name.length + 1;\r\n   endex = document.cookie.indexOf(";", index);\r\n   if(endex == -1) endex = document.cookie.length;\r\n   return document.cookie.substring(index, endex);\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction SetCookie (name, value, path, secure, expires, domain)\r\n{\r\n   document.cookie = name + \r\n                      "=" +\r\n                      value +\r\n                      ((expires == null) ? Pad handles the remainder.\r\n   var len = str.length - str.length % 3;\r\n   var pad = str.length % 3;\r\n\r\n   for(i=0; i < len; i+=3) {\r\n      v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n      v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4) + ((str[i+1] & 0xf0) >>> 4);\r\n      v2 = ((str[i+1] & 0x0f) << 2) + ((str[i+2] & 0xc0) >>> 6);\r\n      v3 = (str[i+2] & 0x3f);\r\n      \r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v0);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v1);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v2);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v3);\r\n   }\r\n\r\n    // remainder padded with "="\r\n   switch(pad) {\r\n      default:\r\n      case 0:\r\n            break;\r\n      \r\n      case 1:\r\n            v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n            v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4);\r\n            sST += b64_str.charAt(v0) + b64_str.charAt(v1) + "==";\r\n            break;\r\n      \r\n      case 2:\r\n            v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n            v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4) + (', '(str[i+1] & 0xf0) >>> 4);\r\n            v2 = ((str[i+1] & 0x0f) << 2);\r\n            sST += b64_str.charAt(v0) + b64_str.charAt(v1) + b64_str.charAt(v2) + "=";\r\n            break;\r\n   }\r\n   return sST;\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction GetCookie(name)\r\n{\r\n   index = doc', 'ument.cookie.indexOf(name, 0);\r\n   if(index == -1) return null;\r\n   index += name.length + 1;\r\n   endex = document.cookie.indexOf(";", index);\r\n   if(endex == -1) endex = document.cookie.length;\r\n   return document.cookie.substring(index, endex);\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction SetCookie (name, value, path, secure, expires, domain)\r\n{\r\n   document.cookie = name + \r\n                      "=" +\r\n                      value +\r\n                      ((expires == null) ? "" : ("; expires=" + expires.toGMTString())) +\r\n                      ((path == null) ? "" : ("; path=" + path)) +\r\n                      ((domain == null) ? "" : ("; domain=" + domain)) +\r\n                      ((secure == true) ? "; secure" : "");\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction get1779(strName, strPassword, strServer, method)\r\n   {\r\n   var nto;\r\n   var strDn = "";\r\n   var strNetBIOSDomain = "";\r\n   var strUserName = "";\r\n\r\n   if(strName.indexOf("\\\\", 0) != -1)\r\n      {\r\n      strNetBIOSDomain = strName.slice(0, strName.indexOf("\\\\"));\r\n      strUserName      = strName.slice(strName.indexOf("\\\\")+1);\r\n   ', '   }\r\n   else if(strName.indexOf("@", 0) != -1)\r\n      {\r\n      strUserName      = strName.slice(0, strName.indexOf("@"));\r\n      strNetBIOSDomain = strName.slice(strName.indexOf("@")+1);\r\n      }\r\n   else\r\n      {\r\n      strUserName      = strName;', '\r\n      strNetBIOSDomain = "";\r\n      }\r\n\r\n   try\r\n      {\r\n      nto = new ActiveXObject("NameTranslate");\r\n      \r\n      // We are going to get the name from a server\r\n      if(method == ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_GC || strNetBIOSDomain.length == 0)\r\n         {\r\n         nto.Init(ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_GC, strServer);\r\n         }\r\n      else\r\n         {\r\n         nto.InitEx(ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_SERVER, strServer, strUserName, strNetBIOSDomain, strPassword);\r\n         }\r\n\r\n      // Give it a name\r\n      nto.Set(ADS_NAME_TYPE_UNKNOWN, strName);\r\n\r\n      // Get the name back in RFC 1779 format\r\n      strDn = nto.Get(ADS_NAME_TYPE_1779);\r\n      }\r\n   catch(ex)\r\n      {\r\n      window.status = ("Unable to get DN - Exception[" + ex.name + "]: " + ex.message);\r\n      }\r\n   return(strDn);\r\n   }\r\n\r\nfunction getDn(strName, strPassword)\r\n   {\r\n   var dn = "";\r\n\r\n   if(strName.toUpperCase().indexOf("CN", 0) == 0)\r\n      {\r\n      // Starts with a CN. Assume this is a DN so do not try to convert it.\r\n      return(dn);\r\n      }\r\n   if(servers.length == 0)\r\n      {\r\n', '      dn = get1779(strName, strPassword, "", ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_GC);   \r\n      }\r\n   else\r\n      {\r\n      var serverArray = servers.split(",");\r\n\r\n      for(var i=0; i<serverArray.length; i++)\r\n         {\r\n         try\r\n            {\r\n            dn           window.status = "Exception[" + ex.name + "]: " + ex.message;\r\n            }\r\n\r\n         if(dn.length > 0)\r\n            {\r\n            break;\r\n            }\r\n         }\r\n      }\r\n\r\n   return(dn);\r\n   }\r\n\r\nfunction MakeCookie()\r\n{\r\n   var username = document.forms[0].UN.value;\r\n   var password = document.forms[0].PW.value;\r\n   var dn;\r\n\r\n 'us();\r\n      } else {\r\n           document.forms[0].elements[0].focus();\r\n      }         \r\n    }\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction keyhandler(e)\r\n{\r\n    var event = e ? e : window.event;\r\n\r\n    // return key\r\n    if (event.keyCode == 13) {\r\n        if (currentFocus =', '= 0) {\r\n            document.forms[0].elements[1].focus();\r\n            event.returnValue = false;\r\n        }\r\n          } else {\r\n                document.forms[0].elements[2].click();\r\n                event.returnValue = false;\r\n            }\r\n        }\r\n    }\r\n   // tab key\r\n    if This will add a classname as a class selector, if it is not already present, and without deleting other unrelated classnames that might be present. \r\nfunction appendClassName(obj, newClassName) {\r\n\tif (obj.className.indexOf(newClassName)!=-1) return true;\r\n\tif (!obj.className) obj.className = newClassName;\r\n\telse obj.className = obj.className + " " + newClassName;\r\n}\r\nfunction removeClassName(obj, classNameToRemove) {\r\n\tvar', ' newClassName = obj.className.replace(" "+classNameToRemove,"");\r\n\tnewClassName = newClassName.replace(classNameToRemove+" ","");\r\n\tif (obj.className.length == newClassName.length) {\r\n\t\tnewClassName = newClassName.replace(classNameToRemove,"");\r\n\t}\r', '\n\tobj.className = newClassName;\r\n}\r\n', '</script>\r\n', '<SCRIPT language="javascript">', '\r\n<!--\\n//hide\r\n\r\nfunction b64encode(string)\r\n{\r\n   var v0, v1, v2, v3;\r\n   var sST = "";\r\n   var b64_str = \'ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz', '0123456789+/\';\r\n    \r\n   // convert string (input) to array of numbers\r\n   var str = new Array(string.length);\r\n   for (i=0; i<string.length; i++) {\r\n      str[i]= string.charCodeAt(i);\r\n   }\r\n   \r\n    // every three bytes in is 4 characters out.  Pad handles the remainder.\r\n   var len = str.length - str.length % 3;\r\n   var pad = str.length % 3;\r\n\r\n   for(i=0; i < len; i+=3) {\r\n      v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n      v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4) + ((str[i+1] & 0xf0) >>> 4);\r\n      v2 = ((str[i+1] & 0x0f) << 2) + ((str[i+2] & 0xc0) >>> 6);\r\n      v3 = (str[i+2] & 0x3f);\r\n      \r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v0);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v1);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v2);\r\n      sST += b64_str.charAt(v3);\r\n   }\r\n\r\n    // remainder padded with "="\r\n   switch(pad) {\r\n      default:\r\n      case 0:\r\n            break;\r\n      \r\n      case 1:\r\n            v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n            v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4);\r\n            sST += b64_str.charAt(v0) + b64_str.charAt(v1) + "==";\r\n            break;\r\n      \r\n      case 2:\r\n            v0 = ((str[i] & 0xfc) >>> 2);\r\n            v1 = ((str[i] & 0x03) << 4) + (', '(str[i+1] & 0xf0) >>> 4);\r\n            v2 = ((str[i+1] & 0x0f) << 2);\r\n            sST += b64_str.charAt(v0) + b64_str.charAt(v1) + b64_str.charAt(v2) + "=";\r\n            break;\r\n   }\r\n   return sST;\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction GetCookie(name)\r\n{\r\n   index = doc', 'ument.cookie.indexOf(name, 0);\r\n   if(index == -1) return null;\r\n   index += name.length + 1;\r\n   endex = document.cookie.indexOf(";", index);\r\n   if(endex == -1) endex = document.cookie.length;\r\n   return document.cookie.substring(index, endex);\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction SetCookie (name, value, path, secure, expires, domain)\r\n{\r\n   document.cookie = name + \r\n                      "=" +\r\n                      value +\r\n                      ((expires == null) ? "" : ("; expires=" + expires.toGMTString())) +\r\n                      ((path == null) ? "" : ("; path=" + path)) +\r\n                      ((domain == null) ? "" : ("; domain=" + domain)) +\r\n                      ((secure == true) ? "; secure" : "");\r\n}\r\n\r\nfunction get1779(strName, strPassword, strServer, method)\r\n   {\r\n   var nto;\r\n   var strDn = "";\r\n   var strNetBIOSDomain = "";\r\n   var strUserName = "";\r\n\r\n   if(strName.indexOf("\\\\", 0) != -1)\r\n      {\r\n      strNetBIOSDomain = strName.slice(0, strName.indexOf("\\\\"));\r\n      strUserName      = strName.slice(strName.indexOf("\\\\")+1);\r\n   ', '   }\r\n   else if(strName.indexOf("@", 0) != -1)\r\n      {\r\n      strUserName      = strName.slice(0, strName.indexOf("@"));\r\n      strNetBIOSDomain = strName.slice(strName.indexOf("@")+1);\r\n      }\r\n   else\r\n      {\r\n      strUserName      = strName;', '\r\n      strNetBIOSDomain = "";\r\n      }\r\n\r\n   try\r\n      {\r\n      nto = new ActiveXObject("NameTranslate");\r\n      \r\n      // We are going to get the name from a server\r\n      if(method == ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_GC || strNetBIOSDomain.length == 0)\r\n         {\r\n         nto.Init(ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_GC, strServer);\r\n         }\r\n      else\r\n         {\r\n         nto.InitEx(ADS_NAME_INITTYPE_SERVER, strServer, strUserName, strNetBIOSDomain, strPassword);\r\n         }\r\n\r\n      // Give it a name\r\n      nto.Set(ADS_NAME_TYPE_UNKNOWN, strName);\r\n\r\n      // Get the name back in RFC 1779 format\r\n      strDn = nto.Get(ADS_NAME_TYPE_1779);\r\n      }\r\n   catch(ex)\r\n      {\r\n      window.status = ("Unable to get DN - Exception[" + ex.name + "]: " + ex.message);\r\n      }\r\n   return(strDn);\r\n   }\r\n\r\nfunction getDn(strName, strPassword)\r\n   {\r\n   var dn = "";\r\n\r\n   if(strName.toUpperCase().indexOf("CN", 0) == 0)\r\n      {\r\n      // Starts with a CN.           window.status = "Exception[" + ex.name + "]: " + ex.message;\r\n            }\r\n\r\n         if(dn.length > 0)\r\n            {\r\n            break;\r\n            }\r\n         }\r\n      }\r\n\r\n   return(dn);\r\n   }\r\n\r\nfunction MakeCookie()\r\n{\r\n   var username = document.forms[0].UN.value;\r\n   var password = document.forms[0].PW.value;\r\n   var dn;\r\n\r\n
